attributes.action: Please Increase benefits to help with the daily costs
attributes.additional_details: There is many people suffering worldwide and we can't keep up with all the high costs when we don't get paid enough to cover all the expenses for bills food there is people loosening homes and having debits because we can't afford to pay as we don't receive enough of the government to cover
attributes.background: Increase our benefits as we are all suffering to keep up with the costs and to provide for our children as they are suffering with low food and heating and electricity

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase Universal Credit and legacy benefits by £25 a week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626542

Retain the link between welfare benefits and inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625065
